XMLDB.COMMENT: XMLDB file for Moodle plagiarism/safeassign plugin

FIELD.NAME: uuid
FIELD.COMMENT: File UUID generated by SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: supported
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the file could be processed by SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: submissionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Reference to moodle assign_submission table

FIELD.NAME: fileid
FIELD.COMMENT: Reference to moodle files table

TABLE.NAME: plagiarism_safeassign_course
TABLE.COMMENT: Table to save courses UUID generated by SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: uuid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course UUID generated by SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Reference to moodle course table

FIELD.NAME: instructorid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID required to create a new course in the SafeAssign service.

TABLE.NAME: plagiarism_safeassign_assign
TABLE.COMMENT: Info about the assign modules in safeassign.

FIELD.NAME: uuid
FIELD.COMMENT: Assignment UUID generated by SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: assignmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: Reference to moodle assign table

TABLE.NAME: plagiarism_safeassign_subm
TABLE.COMMENT: Information about the submission in safeassign service.

FIELD.NAME: uuid
FIELD.COMMENT: Submission UUID generated by SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: groupsubmission
FIELD.COMMENT: Enable group submission

FIELD.NAME: highscore
FIELD.COMMENT: Highest file submission score

FIELD.NAME: avgscore
FIELD.COMMENT: Average score of the several submission files.

FIELD.NAME: submitted
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the file was submitted to SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: reportgenerated
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the report file was generated by SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: submissionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Reference to moodle submission table

FIELD.NAME: deprecated
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the submission should be deleted from SafeAssign.

FIELD.NAME: hasfile
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the submission has at least one file.

FIELD.NAME: hasonlinetext
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the submission has online text on it.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: UNIX timestamp value when the submission was created.

FIELD.NAME: assignmentid
FIELD.COMMENT: Reference the assign moodle table

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: This field indicates that the submission has been deleted from the SafeAssign server

FIELD.NAME: instructorid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID of an instructor or admin.

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Reference to moodle course table

FIELD.NAME: synced
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the user was synced to SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: unenrolled
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the user has been removed from the given course.

FIELD.NAME: deleted
FIELD.COMMENT: Flag that indicates if the user has been removed from the SafeAssign course.

FIELD.NAME: uuid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course UUID generated by SafeAssign

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Reference to moodle course table

FIELD.NAME: instructorid
FIELD.COMMENT: User ID required to create a new course in the SafeAssign service.
